description.zh: Matomo 是领先的自由开源数据分析平台，旨在提供注重隐私的 Google Analytics 替代方案。它是一个可自托管的 PHP/MySQL 软件，只需五分钟安装即可通过一段 JavaScript 代码追踪多个网站，并实时查看分析报告。Matomo 已被超过 140 万个网站使用，内置强大的隐私保护功能。
description.en: Matomo is a leading Free/Libre open analytics platform designed to provide real-time web analytics. It is a self-hosted PHP/MySQL software that offers a privacy-focused alternative to Google Analytics. After a quick five-minute installation, users can track multiple websites using a simple JavaScript tag and access detailed analytics reports instantly.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 完全自托管，用户掌握所有数据控制权
- 内置隐私合规功能，保护访客数据安全
- 拥有数千个自动化测试，持续维护质量稳定
- 活跃的开源社区，拥有超过20万活跃用户
- 插件化架构，支持定制功能开发

## 功能列表:

- 实时数据分析与访客追踪
- 电商追踪与目标转化追踪
- 活动追踪和自定义变量
- 可拖拽自定义的仪表盘界面
- 自动邮件报告和定期分析摘要
- 地理定位追踪与实时地图展示
- 访客生成插件用于测试与演示
- 强大的分析 API 支持数据访问与集成
- 支持自定义插件开发与第三方扩展
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Fully self-hosted, giving users full control over their data
- Built-in privacy compliance for visitor data protection
- Actively maintained and tested with thousands of automated tests
- Vibrant open-source community with over 200,000 active users
- Extensible through plugins, allowing custom feature development

## Features:

- Real-time analytics and visitor tracking
- E-commerce and goal tracking
- Campaign tracking and custom variables
- Customizable dashboard with drag-and-drop widgets
- Email reports and scheduled analytics summaries
- Geo-location tracking and real-time maps
- Visitor generator plugin for testing and demo purposes
- Powerful Analytics API for data access and integration
- Support for custom plugin development and third-party extensions
